LocaleLayout.title: Dead Frontier 2 Helper
LocaleLayout.description: Dead Frontier 2 Helper is a website that provides information and tools about the game Dead Frontier 2. It is a work in progress and will be updated regularly.

HomePage.title: Home
HomePage.description: Welcome to Dead Frontier 2 Helper. This website provides some useful tools to help you with the problems you encounter in the game.

InformationPage.title: Information
InformationPage.description: Contains some useful information about the game Dead Frontier 2.

BasicPage.title: Basic Information
BasicPage.description: Some useful information about the game Dead Frontier 2. Ex. What is HR, SM, etc.

when-to-reset.title: Reset time of the boss, loot, and mission
when-to-reset.content: Every day at 9:00 AM (UTC+0), the mission needs to be reported before refreshing.

what-is-red-building.title: What is the red building (COMER/PCA/HOSPITAL)?
what-is-red-building.content: The raid building is a special building with special BUFFs, which is relatively difficult compared to other buildings, it is recommended to team up.

what-is-oa.title: What is OA(Outpost Attack)?
what-is-oa.content: Zombies will attack the safe zone at 2, 6, 10 AM/PM (UTC+0), if you help defend, you can get BUFF, you will know the location of OA when the time comes.

what-is-hr-sm.title: What is HR(Human Remains)/SM(Stalker Mission)?
what-is-hr-sm.content: Both are daily missions in the game, completing them can get extra experience, it is a good way to level up, you can use DF2Profiler to find the location of the mission, but the actual location needs to be found by the player in the building, or wait for the good-hearted people to share the location in the official DC.

any-place-increase-chance.title: Any place to increase the chance of searching?
any-place-increase-chance.content: Police Station increases the chance of ammunition and weapon, Hospital and Care Center increase the chance of medical supplies, Store increases the chance of food and drink, Factory increases the chance of car parts and gasoline, you can find the location of various types of buildings on DF2Profiler.

about-speed.title: About speed
about-speed.content: Jogging is simply moving with WASD, sprinting is moving with Shift held down, walking includes aiming, reloading, and healing with Q, sneaking is moving with Ctrl held down, the movement speed is the same for all speeds, that is, 1% movement speed = 1% jogging speed + 1% sprinting speed + 1% walking speed + 1% sneaking speed.

about-tax.title: About tax
about-tax.content: All transactions are subject to a 15% tax, including sending money through the mail.

BossPage.title: Boss
BossPage.description: Information about the boss in the game Dead Frontier 2.

CharacterStatsPage.title: Character Stats
CharacterStatsPage.description: Information about the character stats in the game Dead Frontier 2.

CraftItemPage.title: Craft Item
CraftItemPage.description: Information about the craft item in the game Dead Frontier 2.

CreditsMembershipPage.title: Credits & Membership
CreditsMembershipPage.description: Information about the credits and membership in the game Dead Frontier 2.

ExpPage.title: Experience
ExpPage.description: Information about the experience in the game Dead Frontier 2.

HistoryEventPage.title: History Event
HistoryEventPage.description: Information about the history event in the game Dead Frontier 2.

MonsterHpPage.title: Monster HP
MonsterHpPage.description: Information about the monster HP in the game Dead Frontier 2.

PvpPage.title: PvP
PvpPage.description: Information about the PvP in the game Dead Frontier 2.

ScrapCashPage.title: Scrap Cash
ScrapCashPage.description: Information about the scrap cash in the game Dead Frontier 2.

UpgradeItemPage.title: Upgrade Item
UpgradeItemPage.description: Information about the upgrade item in the game Dead Frontier 2.

MapMissionPage.title: Map & Mission
MapMissionPage.description: Present DF2 Profiler in a more friendly way, as well as some optional side missions.

DF2ProfilerPage.title: DF2 Profiler
DF2ProfilerPage.description: According to the data of DF2 Profiler, display and draw the information on the map.

SideMissionsPage.title: Side Mission
SideMissionsPage.description: Side missions are optional missions that you can complete to earn extra rewards.

PuzzlePage.title: Puzzle
PuzzlePage.description: Provides a list of puzzles solver for the game Dead Frontier 2.

BinaryPage.title: Binary
BinaryPage.description: Convert the binary code to the correct number.

AlphabetPage.title: Alphabet
AlphabetPage.description: Convert the number to the correct Alphabet.

LetterPage.title: Letter
LetterPage.description: Guess the possible letter by the given information.

MorsePage.title: Morse Code
MorsePage.description: Convert the morse code to the correct value.

LightOutPage.title: Light Out
LightOutPage.description: Solve the puzzle by given light stats.

SlidingPage.title: Sliding
SlidingPage.description: Solve the puzzle by sliding the figures.

BlueprintPage.title: Blueprint
BlueprintPage.description: Use it to find the blueprint you need.

AllBlueprintListPage.title: All Blueprint List
AllBlueprintListPage.description: A list of all the blueprints in the game Dead Frontier 2.

DpsCalculatorPage.title: Dps Calculator
DpsCalculatorPage.description: Calculate the damage per second of the weapon.
DpsCalculatorPage.expert-skill: Expert Skill V (+25% Weapon Headshot/Body Damage & Attack Speed)
DpsCalculatorPage.quick-shot-skill: Quick Shot V (+50% Weapon Attack Speed)
DpsCalculatorPage.equip-weapon: Weapon is equipped (If not equipped, remember that the character is only holding the secondary weapon)
DpsCalculatorPage.weapon-stats-precaution: The weapon stats are the stats of the weapon itself, not the stats of the weapon equipped on the character.

ToolPage.title: Tool
ToolPage.description: Some useful tools for the game Dead Frontier 2. Ex. Crosshair third-party software, etc.

crosshair.title: Crosshair
crosshair.description: A third-party crosshair overlay to help you aim better in the game.

borderless-gaming.title: Borderless Gaming
borderless-gaming.description: A tool that allows you to play the game in borderless mode.

ResourceLinkPage.title: Resource Link
ResourceLinkPage.description: Some useful links for the game Dead Frontier 2. Ex. df2profiler, etc.

df2profiler.description: DF2 Profiler is a website that provides information of map and mission in the game Dead Frontier 2. You can use it to find the location of the mission you need to complete.

df2haven.description: DF2 Haven is  an open gaming community in Dead Frontier 2, coming together to share information on quests, bosses, and other gameplay.
